hillbillies.model.unit

Class MoveActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
      • hillbillies.model.unit.MoveActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FollowActivity

    class MoveActivity
extends Activity
    The activity for moving to either a distant cube or a neighbour.
    Invariants:
  • The target must be a valid position.
        this.getUnit().isValidPosition(this.getTarget())
  • The targetNeighbour must be a valid position.
        this.getUnit().isValidPosition(this.getTargetNeighbour())

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MoveActivity(Unit unit)
      Creates the move activity for the given unit.

      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates the move activity for the given unit.

        unit - The unit who is conducting the activity.
        Effect:

        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • advanceTime

        @Model
void advanceTime(double dt)
        Updates the move activity for the given time step.
        Specified by:
        advanceTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        dt - The given time step.
        Postconditions:
      • If default behavior is enabled the unit has a small chance to start sprinting.
      • If the unit is sprinting, his stamina will drain by 1 point every .1 seconds and his speed will be doubled.
      • If the unit arrives at the centre of a new cube he will receive 1 xp.
      • The new position is equal to the old position + the speed vector multiplied by the time step.
      • If the new position is equal to the target the unit stops moving, otherwise he will continue moving.
        • Effect:
        Sets the units new position
            unit.setPosition(newPosition)

      • canSwitch

        boolean canSwitch()
        Returns whether the unit can switch activities, this is possible when the target is not null.
        Specified by:
        canSwitch in class Activity
        Returns:
        True if we aren't just moving to a neighbour.
            this.getTarget() != null

      • switchActivity

        void switchActivity(Activity newActivity)
        Switch to a new Activity.
        Overrides:
        switchActivity in class Activity
        Parameters:
        newActivity - The new Activity the unit will execute.
        Effect:
        Set the pending Activity.
            this.setPendingActivity(newActivity)

      • reset

        @Raw
void reset()
        Resumes the moving activity, which does nothing since the target would only be updated.
        Specified by:
        reset in class Activity
        Postconditions:
      • The path will be cleared.
            new.getPath() == null
      • Clear the target and targetNeighbour.
            new.getTarget() == null && new.getTargetNeighbour() == null
      • Clear the pendingActivity.
            new.getPendingActivity() == null
      • Reset the sprintStaminaTimer.
            new.getSprintStaminaTimer() == 0
        • Effect:
        Stop the unit sprinting and clear the unit's speed.
            this.getUnit().setSprinting(false) && this.getUnit().setSpeed(null)

      • updateAdjacent

        @Model
void updateAdjacent(int dx,
                           int dy,
                           int dz)
                    throws InvalidPositionException
        Moves to the given adjacent cube and stop pathing.
        Parameters:
        dx - The x direction to move to.
        dy - The y direction to move to.
        dz - The z direction to move to.
        Postcondition:
        The path will be cleared.
            new.getPath() == null
        Effect:
        Move the unit to the given neighbour cube.
            this.moveToNeighbour(dx, dy, dz)
        Throws:
        InvalidPositionException

      • updateTarget

        @Model
void updateTarget(IntVector newTarget)
                  throws InvalidPositionException,
                         UnreachableTargetException
        Updates the target to move to.
        Parameters:
        newTarget - The new target to move to.
        Postcondition:
        The route will be calculated.
            new.getPath() ==
                  this.getUnit().getPathFinder().getPath(this.getUnit().getPosition().toIntVector(),
                                                         new.getTarget())
        Effects:
      • If the unit is executing a task, and the target is changed, interrupt the task.
            if (this.getUnit().hasTracker()) then ( this.getUnit().interruptTask() )
      • Set the new Target.
            this.setTarget(newTarget)
      • Move to the new next neighbour.
            goToNextNeighbour().
      • If the target is unreachable and this activity is the current activity, then finish the activity.
            if ( this.getUnit().getCurrentActivity() == this &&
                 !this.getUnit().getPathFinder().isReachable(this.getUnit().getPosition().toIntVector(),
                                                             newTarget) )
            then ( this.getUnit().finishCurrentActivity() )
        • Throws:
        InvalidPositionException - The given target is invalid. | !this.getUnit().isValidPosition(newTarget)
        UnreachableTargetException - Throws if the target can't be reached. | !this.getUnit().getPathFinder().isReachable(this.getUnit().getPosition().toIntVector(), newTarget)
